column4: May 15]], [[1998]] </ref> was a stage actor, making only rare appearances on big and small screen.<ref>[http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0448917/ Godfrey Kenton] at [http://www.imdb.com/ IMDb]</ref> He also made three two-year periods with the [[BBC
column5: BBC Drama Repertory Company]], the first being in World War II.<ref name="Ind"/> During the second, in [[1955]] and [[1956]], he was cast as [[Aragorn]] in [[Terence Tiller]]'s adaptation of ''[[The Lord of the Rings (1955 radio series)
column6: The Lord of the Rings]]''.<ref name="RT1672">Radio Times, Volume 129, No. 1672, [[25 November
column7: November 25]], [[1955]]</ref> In the second half, of [[1956]], he also provided the voice of [[Mablung (ranger of Ithilien)
